sections.title: iFixit Quality Guarantee
sections.description: Not all parts or sellers are created equal. And sometimes it’s hard to tell apart the good, the bad, and the inconsistent. We’ve spent more than a decade vetting sources and suppliers. Our parts quality consistently leads the industry because we have the most robust processes: all parts are rigorously tested, iFixit certified, and backed by our Lifetime Warranty.

title: MacBook Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your MacBook model and fix your broken laptop!
metaDescription: MacBook parts for DIY repair. Batteries, SSDs and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
As of April 2015 Apple's MacBook brand includes the long lived polycarbonate case 13" MacBook, two later 13" Unibody models, and the latest 12" MacBook with a retina display and an aluminum case.

**For the early generation MacBook, upgrades are easy!** Any 9.5mm SATA hard drive is compatible with these machines, and two RAM slots allow for a fast speed boost. Either a 60 or 85-watt MagSafe adapter will keep your MacBook charged and happy.

Choose your MacBook family to browse for compatible parts.

title: MacBook 13" Unibody (Model A1278) Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your MacBook 13" Unibody (Model A1278) model and fix your broken laptop!
metaDescription: MacBook 13" Unibody (Model A1278) parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, keyboards, logic boards, hard drives, connectors, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
Apple's introduction of the **MacBook Unibody 13"** introduced a new case milled from a single brick of aluminum. Also new to this version is a switch to SATA optical drives and the controversial loss of a Firewire port.

The **MacBook Unibody 13**" can be upgraded to 8GB of RAM using two [PC3-8500 4 GB RAM chips](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/PC3-8500-4-GB-RAM-Chip/IF111-036). The hard drive can also be upgraded to a hefty, yet agile 500 GB 7200 RPM SATA hard drive.

Not sure what's wrong with your laptop? Check out our [Troubleshooting Guide](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/MacBook_Unibody_Troubleshooting)!

Select your machine above or browse all compatible parts to find what you need to fix your laptop!

title: MacBook 13" Core Duo Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your MacBook 13" Core Duo model and fix your broken laptop!
metaDescription: MacBook 13" Core Duo parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, keyboards, logic boards, hard drives, connectors, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The **MacBook 13" Core Duo** can be easily upgraded to a total of 2 GB of memory using [two 1 GB RAM chips](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/PC2-5300-1-GB-RAM-Chip/IF111-000), and a 500 GB 7200 RPM SATA hard drive will give you plenty of storage. You can upgrade to the [Santa Rosa/Penryn Upper Case](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/MacBook-Santa-Rosa-Penryn-Upper-Case-with-Keyboard/IF186-044), featuring a new keyboard layout (including iTunes controls)! The [8x SuperDrive](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/MacBook-MacBook-Pro-15-Inch-8x-SuperDrive/IF185-040) is the fastest optical drive for this model and will make creating DVDs a whiz. Have you ever been caught sleeping while waiting for your file to transfer over slow wireless network? We can wipe away that unnecessary snooze-fest with the Airport Extreme 802.11n Card upgrade.

There is one main variation within this model. The heat sink thermal sensors may have three-wall or four-wall connectors. This affects the heat sink and logic board. See photos and part descriptions on the [three-wall](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/MacBook-Heat-Sink-Three-wall-Connectors/IF186-010) or four-wall heat sinks for information on determining which version you have.

Check out our [MacBook troubleshooting page](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/MacBook_Model_A1181_Troubleshooting) for help in diagnosing your machine!

Select your category below or browse all compatible parts to find what you need to fix your laptop!

title: MacBook 13" Core 2 Duo Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your MacBook 13" Core 2 Duo model and bring your laptop back to life!
metaDescription: MacBook 13" Core 2 Duo parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, keyboards, logic boards, hard drives, connectors, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The Core 2 Duo MacBooks feature beefier processors, thanks to the Core 2 Duo chipset.

A total of 3 GB of memory (using a [2 GB RAM chip](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/PC2-5300-2-GB-RAM-Chip/IF111-027) and a [1 GB RAM chip](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/PC2-5300-1-GB-RAM-Chip/IF111-000)) will max out your machine's capacity. The biggest hard drive that can currently be put into these laptops is the 500 GB 7200 RPM SATA hard drive. The [8x SuperDrive](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/MacBook-MacBook-Pro-15-Inch-8x-SuperDrive/IF185-040) is the fastest optical drive for these models and will make creating DVDs a whiz. You can also upgrade the upper case to the [Penryn/Santa Rosa version](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/MacBook-Santa-Rosa-Penryn-Upper-Case-with-Keyboard/IF186-044) with the new keyboard layout (including iTunes controls)!

There is one main variation within these models. Your machine may be a Energy Star-equipped or non-Energy star version. This affects the battery connector and logic board. See photos and part descriptions on the [non-Energy Star](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/MacBook-Battery-Connector-Sleep-Sensor-non-Energy-Star/IF186-015) or [Energy Star](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/MacBook-Battery-Connector-Sleep-Sensor-Energy-Star/IF186-042) battery connector/sleep sensors for information on determining which version you have.

Check out our [MacBook troubleshooting page](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/MacBook_Troubleshooting) for help in diagnosing your machine!

Select your model above or browse all compatible parts to find what you need to fix your laptop!

title: MacBook Retina 12" 2015 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your MacBook Retina 12" 2015 model and fix your broken laptop!
metaDescription: MacBook Retina 12" 2015 parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, keyboards, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
Apple announced the new MacBook at their March 9 unveiling alongside the Apple Watch. The redesigned 2015 MacBook is Apple's latest foray into ultraportable devices. It features a single USB-C port, runs on an Intel Core M processor, and at 13.1mm thick and 2.03 pounds it is thinner and lighter than the MacBook Air.

Available in three colors—silver, space grey, and gold—the new MacBook has a whole host of upgrades. It uses the a Force Touch trackpad—which Apple unveiled in their 13" MacBook Pro earlier this year—as well as a fully redesigned keyboard and a thinner 12-inch Retina display. The 39.7-watt-hour battery delivers up to 9 hours of web browsing and can be charged through the USB-C port.

title: PowerBook G4 Titanium Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replacement parts for your PowerBook G4 Titanium model to fix your broken computer!
metaDescription: PowerBook G4 Titanium parts for DIY repair. Universal Drive Adapters and small parts guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
In the Titanium machines, Apple changed to an internal optical drive and slimmed down the cases.

Any PC133 RAM will provide a speed boost in the two RAM slots. Is storage the limitation? Drop in a larger 9.5mm ATA hard drive! A Superdrive will allow CD and DVD burning, further expanding your laptop's capability.

Is your case cracked or damaged? Switch it out with one from our store!

title: PowerBook G4 Aluminum Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replacement parts for your PowerBook G4 Aluminum model to fix your broken computer!
metaDescription: PowerBook G4 Aluminum parts for DIY repair. Hard drive enclosures and other small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The PowerBook G4 series was Apple's workhorse portable for five years, with slim metal cases and fixed internal components (no more battery/drive bays!). The more advanced Aluminum models replaced the Titanium cases and added Airport Extreme and Bluetooth capabilities.

While PowerBook G4 Aluminum models vary in construction, all can be easily upgraded. With the exception of the Aluminum 12" (with one slot), all PowerBook G4 machines have two RAM slots for an easy memory upgrade. Want to burn CDs or DVDs? Drop a Superdrive in your machine to do it all!

Baffled by what's ailing your broken PowerBook G4? Select your model above to access troubleshooting info and find the part you need!

title: PowerBook G4 Aluminum 12" Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replacement parts for your PowerBook G4 Aluminum 12" model to fix your broken computer!
metaDescription: PowerBook G4 Aluminum 12" parts for DIY repair. Hard drive enclosures and other small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
Apple's Aluminum 12" combines the form factor and internal layout of the iBook with the processing power of the PowerBook.

You can upgrade your Aluminum 12" yourself! One RAM slot allows for a larger PC2700 RAM chip to increase memory, and any 9.5mm hard drive is compatible to expand your storage. Do you want to burn DVDs? Drop in a Superdrive!

Does your Aluminum 12" not charge batteries or boot? Check your DC-in board! If your broken Aluminum 12" is a quandary for you, check out our [Aluminum 12" troubleshooting guide](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/PowerBook_G4_Aluminum_12%22_Troubleshooting) to figure out what is wrong. We carry the components to fix your notebook in our parts store.

title: PowerBook G4 Aluminum 15" Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replacement parts for your PowerBook G4 Aluminum 15" model to fix your broken computer!
metaDescription: PowerBook G4 Aluminum 15" parts for DIY repair. Universal Drive Adapters and small parts guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The Aluminum 15" PowerBook was Apple's offering to fill the void between the small 12" and huge 17" Aluminum Powerbooks.

Two RAM slots can be stuffed with PC2700 RAM in these machines (except for the 1.67 GHz High-Res) for a memory boost. If you need more headroom, any 9.5mm ATA hard drive will fit in 15" Aluminums.

Sadly, the most commonly-faulty part in these notebooks are the RAM slots. If one or more of your RAM slots does not work, the logic board must be replaced to expand RAM. We carry a full variety of logic boards, depending on your model. Check out our [Aluminum 15" troubleshooting guide](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/PowerBook_G4_Aluminum_15%22_Troubleshooting) for further help. We carry parts to restore your machine to working order!

title: MacBook Pro 16" 2019 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your MacBook Pro 16" 2019 model and fix your broken laptop!
metaDescription: MacBook Pro 16" 2019 parts for DIY repair. Speakers, microphones and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
Introduced in November 2019 as model A2141, this MacBook Pro features Coffee Lake processors up to the 2.4 GHz Intel Core i9 processor with Turbo Boost up to 5.0 GHz.

The most common repairs with the 16" MacBook Pro 2019 laptops are replacing a dead battery, replacing a malfunctioning fan, or a damaged display assembly.

The battery in a MacBook Pro 16" 2019 is adhered to the inside of the upper case. Our replacement batteries include the needed adhesive.

The MacBook Pro 16" 2019 models require a [P5 Pentalobe Screwdriver](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Tools/P5-Pentalobe-Screwdriver-Retina-MacBook-Pro-and-Air/IF145-090) to remove the lower case to begin any internal repairs. Our battery kits include all the needed tools.

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's MacBook Pro 16" 2019 [repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/MacBook_Pro_16%22_2019) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

title: MacBook Pro 16" 2021 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your MacBook Pro 16" 2021 model and fix your broken laptop!
metaDescription: MacBook Pro 16" 2021 parts for DIY repair. Speakers, microphones and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
Introduced in October 2021 as model A2485, this MacBook Pro features Apple M1 Pro processors up to a 10-core CPU and 16-core Neural Engine.

The most common repairs with the 16" MacBook Pro 2021 laptops are replacing a dead battery, replacing a malfunctioning fan, or a damaged display assembly.

The battery in a MacBook Pro 16" 2021 is adhered to the inside of the upper case. Our replacement batteries include the needed adhesive.

The MacBook Pro 16" 2021 models require a [P5 Pentalobe Screwdriver](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Tools/P5-Pentalobe-Screwdriver-Retina-MacBook-Pro-and-Air/IF145-090) to remove the lower case to begin any internal repairs. Our battery kits include all the needed tools.

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's MacBook Pro 16" 2021 [repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/MacBook_Pro_16%22_2021) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

While the iBook G4 looks similar to its G3 predecessor, some key upgrades lurk within its interior. A slot-loading optical drive replaced the tray-loading drive of the G3. Apple's iBook G4 also adds Airport Extreme and Bluetooth capability.

Even better, iBook G4 upgrades can be performed yourself! One RAM slot allows an easy speed boost with a RAM chip swap. A larger-capacity 9.5mm ATA hard drive will provide a simple storage upgrade and you can install our G4 8x SuperDrive to add DVD burning capability to your iBook G4. A 45-watt G4 AC adapter will provide a plethora of power for your machine to keep it running strong.

Can't figure out what went wrong in your broken iBook G4? Look to our troubleshooting guides ([iBook G4 12"](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/iBook_G4_12%22_Troubleshooting) or [iBook G4 14"](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/iBook_G4_14%22_Troubleshooting)) for assistance. Common problems with these notebooks include inverter/display cable issues, case cracks, and DC-in board failure. If you need a part to repair your laptop, we offer it in our store!

The PowerPC Mac mini offers a single RAM slot, enabling a maximum of 1 GB of RAM. If your mini's RAM isn't already maxed out, [adding more RAM](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Guide/Mac+mini+(PowerPC)+RAM+Replacement/273) will substantially improve performance. Need more storage? You can [install](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Guide/Mac+mini+(PowerPC)+Hard+Drive+Replacement/268) a massive 320 GB 5400 RPM ATA hard drive for more headroom. If you don't have DVD-burning capabilities already, it's [easy to add](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Guide/Mac+mini+(PowerPC)+Optical+Drive+Replacement/265) a blazing-fast 8x SuperDrive to your mini.

This model also allows for dual display abilities and offers significantly improved graphics capabilities thanks to the addition of a NVIDIA GeForce 9400M graphics card. The 2.53 and 2.66 GHz version have the the "Server" option, which replaces the optical drive with a secondary hard drive.

This Mac mini offers two RAM slots, enabling a maximum of 4 GB of RAM using two [PC3-8500 2 GB RAM Chips](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Mac/PC3-8500-2-GB-RAM-Chip/IF111-029). Need more storage? You can [install](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Guide/Mac+mini+Model+A1283+Hard+Drive+Replacement/1063) a massive and fast 500 GB 7200 RPM SATA hard drive for more headroom.

legacyDescription:
On April 20th, 2021, Apple laid to rest the iMac’s signature curved aluminum design in favor of a thinner, boxier profile, marking the iMac’s first significant reimagining since 2007, and first notable redesign since 2012. Designed around the new M1 SoC (System on a Chip) announced in late 2020, the iMac becomes the fifth device from Apple to adopt their custom silicon—along with the MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, Mac Mini, and iPad Pro.

M series iMacs are distinguished by new vibrant colors, white bezels, color-matched magnetic power connectors and peripherals, and 4.5K Retina displays. Notably, the Apple logo is gone from the front chin. Apple launched the first in the lineup, a 24” model with the M1 chip, on May 21st, 2021, which is 11.5 mm thick and features a new, updated 1080p webcam.

title: iPod Touch 5th Gen (model A1509 16 GB/2013) Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.

legacyDescription: Released without an official announcement in May 2013, the iPod Touch 5th Generation with 16 GB of storage is similar to the previously released iPod Touch 5th Generation with 32 or 64 GB of storage, but it lacks a rear facing camera, a wrist strap post, and it is only available with a black face and silver back. Among the features that have not changed for this version are the multi-touch "retina" display with 1136x640 resolution, a front facing "Face Time" camera, and support for Bluetooth 4.0, 802.11n Wi-Fi, Siri, and AirPlay. This version is externally identified by the model number **A1509**. This model was replaced in June 2014 with a 5th generation iPod Touch with 16 GB of storage that restored the rear facing camera and the model number A1421 to match the 32 GB and 64 GB models.

This generation features a multi-touch "retina" display with 1136x640 resolution, front and rear-facing cameras, and support for Bluetooth 4.0, 802.11n Wi-Fi, Siri, and AirPlay. Cases for this version are available in six different colors: dark gray with a black glass front, and silver, pink, yellow, blue, or red with a white glass front. The iPod Touch 5th Generation with 16, 32, or 64 GB of storage is externally identified by the model number **A1421** (from May 2013 to May 2014 a 16 GB model with no rear facing camera was identified by model number A1509).

Apple made a bold design change with the **iPod Nano 3rd Gen**, switching to a shorter and wider form factor. The larger screen can now display video, and there are several unique case colors to choose from.

This device features flash memory permanently affixed to the logic board. While replacing a broken logic board, you can upgrade to [8 GB](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPod/iPod-nano-3rd-Gen-8-GB-Logic-Board/IF134-001) of memory! Be aware that you will need a new [rear panel](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPod/iPod-nano-3rd-Gen-Rear-Panel-New/IF134-002) every time you open this iPod (Apple designed these to not be user-serviceable, which isn't very nice).

Although the battery is soldered to the logic board, it is user-replaceable! From May 2013 to May 2014, a 5th generation iPod Touch with 16 GB of storage and no rear facing camera (model number A1509) was available. This was replaced in June 2014 with a 5th generation iPod Touch with 16 GB of storage that restored the rear facing camera and the model number A1421.

description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.

legacyDescription:
The iPhone 3G built upon the success of the original iPhone by adding features some thought should have been included in the original. Notable in these additions are 3G and GPS capability.

In terms of design, Apple went to a more scratch-resistant plastic rear bezel and separate parts for the [display](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-3G-Display/IF137-001) and [front panel](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-3G-Front-Panel/IF137-000).

Fortunately, if just the outside glass is cracked, only the glass and digitizer must be replaced. To make this common repair easier, we offer an iFixit iPhone 3G Front Panel Kit that includes the parts and tools to repair your iPhone's cracked front panel. We offer a variety of replacement parts in our store to rectify your iPhone 3G's problems. Our free [repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPhone_3G) will also allow you to fix it yourself!

The 1st Gen iPhone took the world by storm. With its multitouch graphical-user-interface, Safari-based internet capability, and sleek design, it quickly became one of the most popular smartphones ever (shameless plug: we were the first to [take it apart](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Teardown/iPhone+1st+Generation+Teardown/599)!).

legacyDescription: The iPhone 3GS was introduced in 2009 in 16 and 32 GB configurations. This model boasts faster everything, from processing power to downloads. Apple introduced an 8 GB version in 2010 as a lower-cost alternative to the iPhone 4. Although the iPhone 3GS looks very similar to the iPhone 3G, parts are not interchangeable between the two phones. Select your category below or browse all parts to find what you need!

title: iPhone 4 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPhone 4 model and fix your broken phone!
metaDescription: iPhone 4 parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
In June 2010, Apple released the 4th generation iPhone, which introduced a few major changes from the preceding 3GS. The new hardware change showed a shift from smooth round edges and a plastic backing to a thinner, more rectangular, all-around glass design. The iPhone 4 features a front and rear camera, Retina display and 512 MB RAM, receiving a generally positive reception. The iPhone 4 is the first iPhone capable of video conferencing, or ‘FaceTime’, over Wi-Fi. The primary camera takes 5MP photos with LED flash and shoots full 1:1 720p video at 30 FPS. The Apple iPhone 4 boasts an A4 processor along with iOS4 which notably introduced multitasking functionality.

The iPhone 4 earned a 6 out of 10 in iFixit’s repairability assessment. See the full [iPhone 4 Teardown](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Teardown/iPhone+4+Teardown/3130) for more.

Apple released different versions of the iPhone 4 — the [iPhone 4 GSM model](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-4-%28GSM%29) and the [iPhone 4 CDMA model](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-4-Verizon) — which host a variety of small modifications. Select your category at the top of the page or browse all compatible parts to find what you need to fix your iPhone!

title: iPhone 4 (CDMA) Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPhone 4 (CDMA) model and fix your broken phone!
metaDescription: iPhone 4 (CDMA) parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
In January 2011, Verizon Wireless announced that it had reached an agreement with Apple and would begin selling the CDMA version of the iPhone 4 (A1349), ending Apple’s exclusive agreement with AT&T. This version of the phone supports personal hotspot and has a battery life up to 7 hours of talk time (3G) on one charge.

The most common repairs needed for the CDMA iPhone 4 are cracked displays and rear panels, and dead batteries. iFixit carries the best [iPhone 4 screens](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-4-CDMA-Verizon-Screen/IF189-000), [iPhone 4 glass rear panels](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-4-CDMA-Verizon-Blank-Rear-Glass-Panel/IF189-001), and [iPhone 4 batteries](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-4-Battery/IF182-000) on the market, along with an entire catalog of other iPhone 4 parts for the less common repairs.

Apple introduced the pentalobe screw with newer models of the iPhone 4, requiring the use of the [Pentalobe P2 screwdriver](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Tools/P2-Pentalobe-Screwdriver-iPhone/IF145-096). Along with this special screwdriver, all iPhone 4 repairs will require a set of other standard precision electronics tools. All iFixit Fix Kits come with all tools needed to complete the desired repair.

Once all parts and tools have been acquired, check out iFixit’s [iPhone 4 repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPhone_4) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

The iPhone 4 earned a 6 out of 10 in iFixit’s repairability assessment. See the full [iPhone 4 Teardown](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Teardown/iPhone+4+Teardown/3130) and video below for more:

title: iPhone 4S Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPhone 4S model and fix your broken phone!
metaDescription: iPhone 4S parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
In October 2011, Apple released the iPhone 4S for AT&T, T-mobile, Verizon, and Sprint. Featuring front and back glass panels, a front and rear camera, and retina display, the iPhone 4S looks identical to the iPhone 4. The iPhone 4S is externally identified by the model number A1387.

Inside it now runs the A5 Processor just like the iPad 2. The rear camera now sports an 8MP camera with LED flash and shoots full 1:1 1080p video at 30 FPS while the front camera retains the VGA quality photos and 30 FPS of its predecessor. title: iPhone 6 Plus Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPhone 6 Plus model and fix your broken phone!

legacyDescription:
Announced on September 9, 2014, the iPhone 6 Plus shows very few external upgrades from the iPhone 6 model, other than an increase in screen size from a 4.7 inch display to a 5.5 inch display. This Apple phone features a 1920x1080 (401 ppi) retina display, an 8 megapixel rear camera with optical image stabilization and phase detection autofocus, a 1.2 megapixel front camera, a fingerprint sensor embedded in the home button, and support for "Apple Pay" transactions. Case color choices are silver or gold, both with a white glass front, or space gray with a black glass front and a gray aluminum back.

The iPhone 6 Plus has been infamously known for the IC touchscreen disease. After the release of this phone, many customers have since reported hardware malfunctions in which the touchscreen is rendered unresponsive and a thin gray line is visible at the top of the display. Apple claims that the issue arises when the device has been dropped repeatedly and is caused by a separation of the touch IC chips from the motherboard at the solder points. For more information on touch IC disease see our iFixit.org [touch IC disease](https://ifixit.org/blog/8309/iphone-6-plus-gray-flicker-touch-death/) page.

Other than malfunctioning IC chips, the most commonly needed iPhone 6 Plus repairs are cracked screens and dead battery replacements. We’ve got you covered with the best [iPhone 6 Plus screens](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-6-Plus-Screen/IF269-000) and [iPhone 6 Plus batteries](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-6-Plus-Battery/IF269-002) on the market, along with a complete catalog of other iPhone 6 Plus parts for the less common repairs.

All iPhone 6 Plus repairs will require a [Pentalobe P2 screwdriver](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Tools/P2-Pentalobe-Screwdriver-iPhone/IF145-096) in addition to standard precision electronics tools. The iPhone 6s is nearly identical in design to the iPhone 6. In response to the “bendgate” design flaws of the previous models, changes were made to improve the durability of the chassis. The 6s was constructed from a stronger, 7000 series aluminum alloy, key points in the rear casing were strengthened, and touchscreen integrated circuits were relocated to the display assembly. Alongside the existing gold, silver, and space gray options, a new rose gold color option was also introduced.

One of the largest reported hardware issues with the iPhone 6s was unexpected battery shutdowns. Apple issued a warranty for phones with a limited span of serial numbers, however if your phone doesn’t fall under this category, don’t worry — iFixit has all the parts necessary for the most common iPhone 6s fixes including dead battery replacements and cracked screens. Ten years after the launch of the original iPhone, Apple’s latest refresh of the product line skips the ‘iPhone 7s’ name in favor of the iPhone 8 and iPhone 8 plus. The iPhone 8 (as well as the 8 Plus and the X) was formally announced on September 12, 2017. The design has remained fairly similar to its predecessor, with the only distinguishing difference being the switch from an aluminum backing to a glass back case. Apple has refined this design over the last three years, so it’s highly polished. The iPhone 8 has added fast-charging support, so you can charge up to 50 percent of the battery in 30 minutes. There’s also wireless charging support through the Qi standard, made possible by the new glass back. Internally, the phone possesses a new hexa-core system-on-chip with two high-performance cores and four high-efficiency cores along with an Apple designed GPU that all work to improve system and graphics performance.

There are three models of the iPhone 8. [Model A1863](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-8-A1863) is available for carriers Verizon and Sprint in the U.S. and for carriers in China, Hong Kong, Australia, and New Zealand. [Model A1905](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-8-A1905) is available for carriers AT&T and T-Mobile in the U.S. and for carriers in Canada, the UK, Europe, and globally excluding Hong Kong, China, and Japan. [Model A1906](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-8-A1906) is for carriers in Japan.

Officially announced by Apple on September 12, 2017 the iPhone 8 Plus sports a very similar external design to the last four years of iPhone releases, making the phone seem almost stagnant in a market where the push for constant improvement is unrelenting. However internally, the iPhone 8 Plus boasts a six core A11 bionic processor which is the same as its smaller siblings, but impressive nonetheless. The main performance boost with this generation of iPhone is the battery life and RAM storage. The RAM has been upgraded by a whole gigabyte of memory to help with multitasking, and the battery life can last a solid 32 hours between charges on average. With this level of stamina, the iPhone 8 Plus has few rivals. The cameras on the back are improved 12 megapixel camera, which both have physically larger sensors than last year’s iPhone 7 Plus on which the dual-camera system was introduced. The two cameras work together one has a standard wide-angle f/1.8 lens and the other has a slower f/2.8 lens with an effective two times magnification compared to the standard lens.

The most commonly needed repairs for the iPhone 8 Plus are cracked screens and dead battery replacements. iFixit has the best [iPhone 8 Plus screens](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-8-Plus-LCD-and-Digitizer/IF372-000) and [iPhone 8 Plus batteries](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-8-Plus-Battery/IF372-001) on the market.

All iPhone 8 Plus repairs will require a [Pentalobe P2 screwdriver](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Tools/P2-Pentalobe-Screwdriver-iPhone/IF145-096) in addition to standard precision electronics tools. Any repair that removes the battery from the chassis will require replacement adhesive strips. All iFixit Fix Kits come with all tools and replacement adhesive needed to complete the repair.

Once all tools and parts have been acquired, check out iFixit’s [iPhone 8 Plus repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPhone_8_Plus) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

There are three models of the iPhone 8 plus. [Model A1864](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-8-Plus-A1864) is for carriers Verizon and Sprint in the U.S. and for carriers in China, Hong Kong, Australia, and New Zealand. [Model A1897](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-8-Plus-A1897) is for carriers AT&T and T-Mobile in the U.S. and for carriers in Canada, the UK, Europe, and globally excluding Hong Kong, China, and Japan. [Model A1898](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-8-Plus-A1898) is for carriers in Japan.

title: iPhone X Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPhone X model and fix your broken phone!
metaDescription: iPhone X parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The iPhone X (as well as the [8](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPhone_8) and [8 Plus](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPhone_8_Plus)) was formally announced by Apple on September 12, 2017. New features include a new, almost bezel-less display, a new hexa-core system-on-chip with improved system and graphics performance, a glass back, and wireless charging using the Qi Standard. Additional features include a True Tone display and upgraded cameras. It's successor is the [iPhone XS](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPhone_XS) which was released about a year later.

Most iPhone X repairs are made to replace cracked screens and swap out dead batteries. iFixit has high quality parts for iPhone X screen replacements and [iPhone X battery replacements](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-X-Battery/IF377-001). The iPhone X screen is adhered to the frame, and the battery is adhered to the inside of the phone. Once the phone is opened, this [adhesive](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPhone/iPhone-X-Display-Assembly-Adhesive/IF377-048) will need to be replaced.

The iPhone X requires a [Pentalobe P2](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Tools/iFixit-Precision-4-mm-Screwdriver-Bit/IF145-373) to open and a [Y000](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Tools/iFixit-Precision-4-mm-Screwdriver-Bit/IF145-373) for most internal repairs.

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's [iPhone X repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPhone_X) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

The iPhone X [earned a 6 out of 10](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Teardown/iPhone+X+Teardown/98975) in iFixit’s repairability assessment. Watch the Teardown Review for more:

title: iPad mini 1st Gen Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPad mini 1st Gen model and fix your broken tablet!
metaDescription: iPad mini 1st Gen parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
Apple released the iPad mini in November 2012, a smaller and lighter version of the iPad tablet featuring a 1024-by-768 163 pixel per inch touch-sensitive display, a dual core 1 GHz processor, 512 MB of RAM, and three flash memory options of 16, 32, or 64 GB. External connection and power supply is handled by a Lightning port, in place of the Dock Connector port of earlier iPads. The iPad mini has a rear-mounted 5 megapixel "iSight" camera and a front-mounted 1.2 megapixel "FaceTime HD" camera. The iPad mini can be identified by the model number printed on the bottom of the rear case, A1432 for the Wi-Fi only model, A1455 for the GSM/CDMA/LTE model, and A1454 for the GSM/LTE model.

The most common iPad mini repairs are replacing a cracked screen or a dead battery. iFixit has complete repair kits for an [iPad Mini screen](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-mini-1-2-Screen-Digitizer/IF122-001) or [iPad Mini battery](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-mini-Battery/IF122-023).

The iPad mini front glass panel is held to the aluminum case with strips of adhesive. Once the device is opened, [this adhesive](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-mini-mini-2-Adhesive-Strips/IF122-010) will need to be replaced. Our iPad mini repair kits include the needed adhesive.

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's [iPad mini repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPad_Mini) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

The iPad mini earned a 2 out of 10 in iFixit's repairability assessment. Watch the Teardown Review for more:

title: iPad 4th Gen Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPad 4 model and fix your broken tablet!
metaDescription: iPad 4 parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
As the fourth device in the iPad line, the iPad 4 includes an upgraded charging port—now called the Lightning port—that replaces the Dock Connector port of earlier iPads. Internally, the improvements to the 4th Gen iPad include a 1.2 megapixel FaceTime HD front-mounted camera, a faster processor, and support for dual band/dual stream Wi-Fi. The fourth generation iPad device has a 9.7” touchscreen display with 2048x1536 pixel color IPS LCD and 264 ppi.This iPad model was offered in 16, 32, or 64 GB capacities with color options of white or black.

There are three models of the iPad 4. The [Wi-Fi](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-4th-Gen-Wi-Fi), [GSM](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-4th-Gen-LTE-GSM), and [CDMA](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-4th-Gen-LTE-CDMA) models were released on November 2, 2012.

Following the announcement of the iPad Air on October 22, 2013, sales of the fourth-generation iPad were discontinued. The fourth-generation iPad was reintroduced on March 18, 2014, following the discontinuation of the iPad 2. In order to make its reintroduction a low-end device to the iPad Air, its price was cut by 20% over its original launch price. On October 16, 2014, the fourth-generation iPad was discontinued in favor of the iPad Air 2 the iPad Air took its place as the entry-level iPad at that time.

Select your model above for parts, guides and more.

title: iPad 1st Gen Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replacement parts for your iPad 1st Gen model to fix your broken tablet!
metaDescription: iPad 1st Gen parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The first generation of the iPad established design precedents, some of which, such as the home button placement, have persisted through all models. The device features an Apple A4 processor — which is comprised of a 1 GHz processor, 256 MB of RAM and a PowerVR SGX535 GPU — and a 9.7” touchscreen display with 1024x758 pixel resolution and 132 ppi. The first generation iPad is equipped with either 16, 32, or 64GB of solid-state memory for program and data management.

There are two models of the first generation iPad. The [Wi-Fi variant](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-Wi-Fi) was released in the United States on April 3, 2010, followed by the [Wi-Fi and Cellular variant](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-3G) on April 30, 2010. Unlike its successors, the Wi-Fi and cellular variant of the first generation iPad can only support GSM/UMTS standards and is not compatible with CDMA networks.

Select your model above for parts, guides and more.

title: iPad 2nd Gen Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPad 2 model and fix your broken tablet!
metaDescription: iPad 2 parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, connectors, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
As the second device in the iPad line, the iPad 2 gained a faster dual core A5 processor, a lighter build structure, and was the first iPad to feature VGA front-facing and 720p rear-facing cameras designed for FaceTime video calling. The second generation iPad device has a 9.7” touchscreen display with 1024x768 pixel resolution and 132 ppi, and is equipped with either 16, 32, or 64GB of solid-state memory for program and data management.

There are four models of the second generation iPad. The [Wi-Fi (EMC 2415)](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-2-Wi-Fi), [GSM](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-2-GSM), and [CDMA](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-2-CDMA) were released in the United States on March 11, 2011, followed by the [Wi-Fi (EMC 2560)](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-2-Wi-Fi-%28EMC-2560%29) in March of 2012, which is only available in the 16 GB capacity. This generation of iPad was the first to incorporate compatibility with the CDMA network.

The 32 and 64 GB models were discontinued on March 7, 2012, upon the introduction of the third generation iPad. The 16 GB Wi-Fi and 16 GB Wi-Fi + 3G models were discontinued on March 18, 2014.

Select your model above for parts, guides and more.

title: iPad 3rd Gen Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPad 3 model and fix your broken tablet!
metaDescription: iPad 3 parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
As the third device in the iPad line, the iPad 3 includes an upgraded A5X processor, 5 megapixel rear-facing camera, a higher resolution ‘retina’ display, HD 1080p video recording, and voice dictation. The third generation iPad device has a 9.7” touchscreen display with 2,048x1,536 pixel color IPS LCD and 264 ppi. This iPad model was offered in 16, 32, or 64 GB capacities for program and data management, with color options of white or black.

There are three models of the iPad 3. The [Wi-Fi](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-3rd-Gen-Wi-Fi), [GSM](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-3rd-Gen-LTE-GSM), and [CDMA](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-3rd-Gen-LTE-CDMA) models were released on March 16, 2012.

After only seven months of official availability, the third-generation iPad was discontinued on October 23, 2012, following the announcement of the fourth generation iPad. The third-generation iPad had the shortest lifespan of any iOS product. It is also the last iPad to support the 30-pin dock connector, as the fourth generation iPad and later use the Lightning connector.

Select your model above for parts, guides and more.

Announced in October 2014, the iPad Air 2 features Touch ID, Apple Pay, and a 64-bit A8X processor with M8 motion coprocessor. The rear-facing camera has been bumped to 8 MP, up from the 5 MP shooter found on previous iPads. The iPad Air 2 can be identified by the model number printed on the bottom of the rear case, A1566 for the Wi-Fi only model and A1567 for the cellular model.

The most common iPad Air 2 repairs are replacing a cracked screen or a dead battery. iFixit has complete repair kits for an [iPad Air 2 screen](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-Air-2-Screen/IF276-000) or [iPad Air 2 battery](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-Air-2-Battery/IF276-007).

The iPad Air 2 front glass panel is held to the aluminum case with strips of adhesive. Once the device is opened, this adhesive will need to be replaced. Our iPad Air 2 repair kits include the needed adhesive.

The iPad 3rd Gen 4G includes 802.11n wireless and 3G and 4G capabilities (service is subject to carrier and local availability). This iPad model was offered in 16, 32, or 64 GB capacities with color options of white or black.

There are two versions of the iPad 3rd Gen 4G. The [GSM](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-3rd-Gen-LTE-GSM) and [CDMA](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-3rd-Gen-LTE-CDMA) models were released simultaneously.

After only seven months of official availability, the third-generation iPad was discontinued on October 23, 2012, following the announcement of the fourth generation iPad. The third-generation iPad had the shortest lifespan of any iOS product. It is also the last iPad to support the 30-pin dock connector, as the fourth generation iPad and later use the Lightning connector.

legacyDescription:
Apple released the iPad mini in November 2012, a smaller and lighter version of the iPad tablet featuring a 1024-by-768 163 pixel per inch touch-sensitive display, a dual core 1 GHz processor, 512 MB of RAM, and three flash memory options of 16, 32, or 64 GB. External connection and power supply is handled by a Lightning port, in place of the Dock Connector port of earlier iPads. The iPad mini has a rear-mounted 5 megapixel "iSight" camera and a front-mounted 1.2 megapixel "FaceTime HD" camera. The iPad mini Wi-Fi model can be identified by the model number A1432 printed on the bottom of the rear case.

The most common iPad mini repairs are replacing a cracked screen or a dead battery. iFixit has complete repair kits for an [iPad Mini screen](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-mini-1-2-Screen-Digitizer/IF122-001) or [iPad Mini battery](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-mini-Battery/IF122-023).

The iPad mini front glass panel is held to the aluminum case with strips of adhesive. Once the device is opened, [this adhesive](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-mini-mini-2-Adhesive-Strips/IF122-010) will need to be replaced. Our iPad mini repair kits include the needed adhesive.

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's [iPad mini repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPad_Mini) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

legacyDescription:
iPad Air is a line of tablet computers designed, developed and marketed by Apple, which run the iOS mobile operating system. It took the iPad and transformed it into an even more lightweight and portable device. The user interface is built around the device’s multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard. Standard models feature Wi-Fi connectivity, while 3G and LTE models add capability to use cell towers to gather information.

An iPad Air can shoot video, take photos, play music, and perform internet functions such as web-browsing and emailing. Other functions such as games, GPS and navigation, and social networking can be enabled by downloading and installing apps.

Since the release of the iPad Air in late 2013, there have been two versions of the iPad Air, the [original iPad Air](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-Air-1st-Gen) and the [iPad Air 2](https://www.ifixit.com/Store/iPad/iPad-Air-2) which were released one year from each other.

With different models, come different levels of repairability ease, however all of these devices are user-serviceable with the help of our repair guides found in each of the device pages above.

Select your model above for parts, guides and more.

legacyDescription:
Apple released the iPad Air on October 22, 2013. As with the 4th Generation iPad Retina, the iPad Air uses a Lightning port and has a 2048x1536 (264 ppi) display. The external similarities end there. The iPad Air is lighter by nearly half a pound and all case dimensions have shrunk a bit when compared to the previous iPad generation. Case colors are either a white front with a silver back or a black front with a gunmetal gray back.

The iPad Air Wi-Fi/Cellular model was offered in 16, 32, 64, or 128 GB capacities, supports A-GPS, and for cellular service supports AT&T, T-Mobile, Verizon, and Sprint in the US and nearly all major carriers around the world. iPad Air models have a dual core 64-bit 1.4 GHz Apple A7 processor and an M7 motion coprocessor.

The most commonly needed repairs for the first generation iPad Air are cracked screens and dead battery replacements. iFixit has the best [iPad Air displays](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-Air-Screen-Digitizer/IF128-018) and [iPad Air batteries](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-Air-iPad-5-iPad-6-Battery/IF128-027) on the market, along with a complete catalog of other first generation iPad Air parts for the less common part swaps.

All first generation iPad Air repairs will require a set of standard precision electronics tools. Any repair that involves removing the front panel will require [iPad Air adhesive strips](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-Air-iPad-5-iPad-6-Adhesive-Strips/IF128-005) to ensure a full coverage and secure bond between replaced parts. All iFixit Fix Kits come with all tools and adhesive needed to complete the desired repair.

Once all parts and tools have been acquired, head to iFixit’s [iPad Air repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPad_Air_LTE) for step-by-step instructions on how to complete your desired repair.

title: iPad mini 2 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Grab a toolkit for your iPad mini 2 model and fix your broken tablet!
metaDescription: iPad mini 2 parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The 2nd generation iPad mini was released on October 2, 2013. The biggest upgrade to the iPad was the new Retina display which boasted a 2048x1536 resolution. Some of the hardware used for the iPad mini with Retina Display was also used in the iPhone 5S including the A7 processor and cameras.

The most common repairs for the second generation iPad mini are replacing a cracked front glass screen or a dead battery. iFixit has complete repair kits for an [iPad mini 2 screen](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-mini-1-2-Screen-Digitizer/IF122-001) or [iPad mini 2 battery](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/iPad/iPad-mini-2-Battery/IF127-012).

The iPad mini 2 front glass panel is held to the aluminum case with strips of adhesive. Once the device is opened, this adhesive will need to be replaced. Our iPad mini 2 repair kits include the needed adhesive.

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's [iPad mini 2 repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/iPad_Mini_2) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

The iPad mini 2 earned a 2 out of 10 in iFixit's repairability assessment. Watch the Teardown Review for more:

legacyDescription:
Microsoft announced the Xbox 360 E alongside the Xbox One in June 2013. The 360 E replaces the Xbox 360 S, the slim version of Microsoft's marquee game console. The Xbox 360 E was immediately available to consumers and would continue to be sold alongside the Xbox One as Microsoft's economy console.

The 360 E is easy to distinguish from previous Xbox 360 consoles because it abandons the tapered design of earlier consoles for a more rectangular form factor. In addition, the rear of the Xbox 360 E has only two USB ports, HDMI or 1/8th inch A/V output for audio and video(component or composite), and a sticker with the model number on it. The power plug has also changed to a circular plug.

Some PS3 models also feature Wi-Fi and/or include a memory card reader.

All three versions of the Hero3 include WiFi functionality. The dimensions of the Hero3 cameras are different from the previous generations making some of the accessories for Hero1 and Hero2 not compatible with Hero3.

Having issues with your GoPro Hero3, and you're not quite sure where to start? Take a look at the [troubleshooting guide](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/GoPro_Hero3_Silver_Troubleshooting).

Has your GoPro Hero3 Black taken some damage from all the awesome adventures it has been through? Don't sweat it, because we've got you covered with a bevy of replacement parts, including (but not limited to!) the [housing](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/GoPro/GoPro-Hero3-Black-Standard-Housing/IF300-044), [lens](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/GoPro/GoPro-Hero3-Black-Lens/IF300-009), and even the [motherboard](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/GoPro/GoPro-Hero3-Black-Motherboard/IF300-007).

Having issues with your GoPro Hero3 Silver and you're not quite sure where to start? Check out the [troubleshooting guide](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Wiki/GoPro_Hero3_Silver_Troubleshooting).

legacyDescription:
GoPro announced the Hero3+ in October 2013 in two editions: black and silver.

GoPro claims the Hero3+ has improved low light performance, a smaller camera housing, improved image sharpness, and better audio with wind noise reduction when compared with previous models.

legacyDescription:
The GoPro Hero3+ Black Edition has video modes of 1440p at 48 fps, 1080p at 60 fps, 960p at 100 fps, and 720p at 120 fps. 12MP stills are captured at up to 30 frames per second. The Black edition includes a WiFi Remote.

Keep your GoPro Hero3+ Black running by replacing the [motherboard](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/GoPro/GoPro-Hero3-Black-Motherboard/IF300-037) with [our guide](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Guide/GoPro+Hero3++Black+Edition+Motherboard+Replacement/41627) or swap out a broken [front panel](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/GoPro/GoPro-Hero3-Black-Front-Panel/IF300-038) with our [awesome replacement guide](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Guide/GoPro+Hero3++Black+Edition+Front+Face+Plate+Replacement/41621).

legacyDescription:
The GoPro Hero5 black is a hyper-portable camera built specially for activity image capturing. The Hero5 was released on October 2, 2016. The camera shoots up to 4k video and can capture 12-megapixel photos.

The camera employs a simple one-button control and is also voice activated. The GoPro Hero5 black is completely waterproof, unlike the earlier generations. The GoPro Hero5 Black can be easily confused with the GoPro Hero5 Session. The most obvious difference between the two is the Black has an LCD touchscreen while the Session does not.

legacyDescription: The Galaxy Gear features an 800 MHz Exynos system-on-chip, a square Super AMOLED touchscreen display (277 PPI), a 1.9 megapixel camera in the watch band, a speaker, two noise-cancelling microphones, 4 GB of internal memory, 512 MB of RAM, an accelerometer, and a gyroscope.

description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replacement parts for your Samsung Gear 2 model to fix your broken smartwatch!

legacyDescription: The Samsung Gear 2 replaces the Android OS of the Galaxy Gear with the Samsung-developed Tizen operating system. The Gear 2 features improved functionality (such as Samsung's S Health software and an integrated music player) and battery life. The Gear 2 camera is now located in the watch itself allowing users to replace the watch bands and new hardware includes an infrared blaster and an optical heart rate sensor.

legacyDescription: The Samsung Gear S features a 2.0” curved Super AMOLED (360 x 480) display, a dual core 1.0 GHz processor, 512 MB of RAM, 4 GB of internal memory, and a 300 mAh lithium-ion battery. An array of sensors include an accelerometer, gyroscope, compass, and barometer, as well as heart rate, ambient light, and ultra violet sensors. The Gear S includes 3G, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth connectivity as well as a USB 2.0 port.

legacyDescription: The Samsung Gear 2 Neo is similar to the Gear 2 but with a plastic exterior and no camera. For this model the Android OS of the Galaxy Gear is replaced by the Samsung-developed Tizen operating system. The Gear 2 Neo features improved functionality (such as Samsung's S Health software and an integrated music player) and battery life. New hardware includes an infrared blaster and an optical heart rate sensor.

title: Apple Watch Series 1 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replace a cracked screen or a dead battery in your Series 1 Apple Watch.
metaDescription: Apple Watch Series 1 parts and kits for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and sensors all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription: The Apple Watch Series 1 is a revamp of the original Apple Watch, announced September 7, 2016 simultaneously with the Apple Watch Series 2. The Apple Watch Series 1 offers similar specifications as the original Apple Watch, but has been equipped with an upgraded dual-core processor and watchOS 3. This watch is available only in an aluminum case with Sport Band.

title: Apple Watch Series 2 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replace a cracked screen or a dead battery in your Series 2 Apple Watch.
metaDescription: Apple Watch Series 2 parts and kits for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and sensors all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
Announced September 7th, 2016 the Apple Watch Series 2 is the successor to Apple's first foray into the realm of smartwatches. This watch offers technical upgrades such as built-in GPS, water resistance up to 50 meters, a faster S2 dual-core processor, and a screen with twice the brightness. With the tagline, "The ultimate device for a healthy life," this watch is made to appeal to runners, swimmers, hikers and meditators alike.

Aesthetically the watch is similar to its predecessor, featuring an identically-sized, square watch face, but it now offers four varieties: Apple Watch (aluminum or stainless steel case), Apple Watch Nike+ (aluminum case with Nike Sport Band), Apple Watch Hermès (stainless steel case with Hermès leather band), and Apple Watch Edition (ceramic case with sport band).

title: Apple Watch Original Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replace a cracked screen or a dead battery in your Original Apple Watch.
metaDescription: Apple Watch Original parts and kits for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and sensors all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The original Apple Watch is Apple's first wearable device. The standard Apple Watch is tailored to the everyday user, and is available in 18 different models. The Apple Watch Sport is designed with fitness in mind, and comes in 10 different models. The Apple Watch Edition is the "premium" version, crafted of 18-karat gold and available in both yellow and rose gold finishes.

Most of the differences in models are in the material or finish of the watch case or in the type of wrist band. The internal parts of the watch are are determined by the case size either 38 mm or 42 mm.

title: Apple Watch Series 3 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replace a cracked screen or a dead battery in your Apple Watch.
metaDescription: Apple Watch Series 3 parts and kits for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and sensors all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
All Apple Watch Series 3 models can be readily identified by the distinctive red dot on the Digital Crown. As with previous models, the watch comes in both 38 mm and 42 mm configurations in a variety of colors and materials. Some models include LTE cellular service. Internally, the watch features a newly-touted barometric altimeter and a battery with slightly upgraded capacity. Tools and repair procedures remain very similar to Apple Watch Series 2.

Versions:

- Apple Watch (aluminum case with Sport Band or Sport Loop, or stainless steel case with Sport Band or Milanese Loop)
- Apple Watch Nike+ (aluminum case with Nike Sport Band or Nike Sport Loop)
- Apple Watch Hermès (stainless steel case with Hermès leather band)
- Apple Watch Edition (ceramic case with Sport Band)

The Charge HR has two band sizes. The small is model FB405BKS and the large is model FB405BKL.

title: Moto 360 (1st Gen) Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with replacement batteries and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! Our replacement batteries are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Get a new battery for your First Generation Moto 360 Smartwatch and bring it back to life!
metaDescription: Moto 360 batteries for DIY repair, tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The 1st generation Moto 360, announced in 2014, is an Android Wear-based smartwatch from Motorola Mobility. Its software displays notifications from paired phones. It uses paired phones to enable interactive features such as search, navigation, playing music, and integration with apps.

Most Moto 360 repairs are made to swap out dead batteries. iFixit has high quality [Moto 360 battery replacements](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Smartwatch/Moto-360-1st-Gen-Battery/IF385-000).

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's [Moto 360 repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/Motorola_Moto_360) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

iFixit is an authorized Motorola parts reseller.

title: Moto 360 2nd Gen Parts

tagline: Get a new battery for your Second Generation Moto 360 Smartwatch and bring it back to life!
metaDescription: Moto 360 batteries for DIY repair, tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The Moto 360 2nd Generation features a round 360x330 display, 1.2 GHz processor, 4GB internal storage, 512MB RAM, and inductive charging with an included dock. Users must rely on touch and voice interaction with the Moto 360 2nd Gen because it only has a single physical button, a power button disguised as a watch dial.

Most Moto 360 2nd Gen repairs are made to swap out dead batteries. iFixit has high quality [Moto 360 2nd Gen battery replacements](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Smartwatch/Moto-360-2nd-Gen-42mm-Battery/IF385-001).

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's [Moto 360 2nd Gen repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/Motorola_Moto_360_2nd_Gen) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

iFixit is an authorized Motorola parts reseller.

title: Apple Watch Series 4 Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replace a cracked screen or a dead battery in your Series 4 Apple Watch.
metaDescription: Apple Watch Series 4 parts and kits for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and sensors all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
LTE versions of Apple Watch Series 4 can be identified by the distinctive red circle on the digital crown (in place of the red dot from the Series 3). The watch now comes in 40 mm and 44 mm configurations in a variety of colors and materials. Internally, the watch features a newly-engineered digital crown with haptic feedback and an electrical heart sensor for additional readings on that ticker of yours. The battery has a slightly upgraded capacity. The watch now comes with an all ceramic and sapphire crystal back to enhance RF connectivity.

Versions:

- Apple Watch (aluminum case with Sport Band or Sport Loop, or stainless steel case with Sport Band or Milanese Loop)
- Apple Watch Nike+ (aluminum case with Nike Sport Band or Nike Sport Loop)
- Apple Watch Hermès (stainless steel case with Hermès leather band)

Google announced the Pixelbook in 2017. The Pixelbook is Google's sucessor to the Chromebook Pixel. It features two USB-C ports, and runs on an Intel Core i5 or i7 processor. The Pixelbook is one of Google's thinnest laptops ever released.

The Pixelbook lacks unique physical features that set it apart from other Google laptops. Users find difficulty in distinguishing the model from others by comparing only its physical features. To determine its exact model/configuration, power up the device and search this url: chrome://system.

description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replacement parts for your ASUS Chromebook C300MA model to fix your broken laptop!
metaDescription: ASUS Chromebook C300MA parts for DIY repair. Batteries and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The Asus Chromebook C300M was released in June of 2014. The screen is large for budget laptops at 13.3 inches and is lightweight at only 3.1 pounds. The Chromebook comes equipped with an HDMI port, headset jack, SD card reader, single USB 2.0 or 3.0 port, and a AC power adapter. Internal hardware includes an intel Celeron N2830 dual core processor running the Chrome operating system (Chrome OS), a 16 GB solid state drive (SSD), 2GB of Ram, and an Intel HD graphics card.

The Chromebook has dominated the low cost laptop market and was the 2nd highest selling laptop from Amazon during the 2014 holiday season.

It is a laptop with a glorified web browser as its operating system. ASUS Chromebook Flip C100PA was available with 2 GB to 4GB of RAM and only in the silver color. Repair of this device requires screwdrivers and prying tools. Many users complained about its poor camera resolution and low pixel count.

legacyDescription: The Toughbook CF-29 is one of the many rugged laptop computers created by Panasonic. The CF-29 resembles a typical laptop except for a few distinctive features. Most notably, it is about two inches thick and has a carrying handle making it resemble a small, hard-sided briefcase. The CF-29 weighs in at slightly under 8 pounds. Its dimensions are: 11.8” (W) X 2.3” (H) X 9.5” (D). This laptop also has a 13.3” touchscreen. Additionally, it has a battery life of approximately 7 hours. As for connections, the Toughbook has one USB port, a gigabit Ethernet port, and a built-in WiFi antenna.

legacyDescription:
The DJI Phantom 3 Advanced is a quadcopter designed for taking high quality, aerial photos and videos. It was released in April 2015, along with the DJI Phantom 3 Professional. It features a gimbal-mounted HD camera capable of taking up to 2.7k video and images up to 12.4 MP. It’s on-board GPS assists RC hobbyists in taking very stable and smooth images.

The Phantom 3 advanced can be identified by its white plastic shell, typical of DJI quadcopters. This model measures 590mm across diagonally, and features silver stripes on each of the booms. It has an auto-leveling camera mount (also known as a gimbal) under the main airframe. Behind the gimbal, there is also a vision positioning system mounted under the body.

legacyDescription: DJI announced the Phantom 4 Advanced in April 2017. It features a camera with a 1" 20MP CMOS sensor that can shoot 4K/60fps video and advanced flight autonomy systems like ActiveTrack, TapFly, Return to Home, and Draw. The remote feature the upgraded LightBridge technology providing a 4.3 mile transmission range and fairly low latency video downlink. The batteries provide 30 minutes of flight time per charge.

title: Microsoft Surface 1st Gen Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: Replacement parts for your Microsoft Surface 1st Gen model to fix your broken tablet!
metaDescription: Microsoft Surface 1st Gen parts for DIY repair. Screens, motherboards, and small parts all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The Microsoft Surface is the first tablet released by Microsoft. Released on October 26, 2012, it runs on the Windows RT platform, which works exclusively with apps available from the Windows Store. The tablet has an 8 hour battery life and comes standard with Windows Defender security.

Your Surface can be identified with a quick look underneath the stand on the back of the device. The model, size capacity, and serial number will be shown.

legacyDescription: At less than 1.5 pounds and just 8.9 mm thick, Surface RT 2 lets you carry less while you do more. It runs Windows RT 8.1 and comes pre-installed with Microsoft Office 2013 RT, so you get Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote-right out of the box. Surface 2 ups the ante with a more powerful, always-on processor, so it's ready to go when you need it. With an up to 10-hour battery that keeps you charged through the day, Surface 2 is powerful, yet ultra-thin and lightweight.

The Surface Pro also features an Intel i5 core processor. The Surface is advertised with an optional magnetically attached keyboard, making it resemble a very thin netbook. The Surface Pro has 10-point touch detection, with a digital pen and Wacom digitizing technology.

The Surface 3 has a 10.8 inch (27 cm) multi-touch 1920x1280 pixel display, uses a standard Micro-USB port for charging, includes either a 64 or 128 GB solid-state drive, 2 or 4 GB of system memory, and storage capacity can be increased by installing a microSD memory card of up to 200 GB.

It features a Qualcomm Krait CPU, a 4.5" LCD display, and a high-sensitivity capacitive touchscreen covered by curved Gorilla Glass. The Lumia 920 supports inductive charging and is equipped with an 8.7-megapixel PureView camera with optical image stabilization for still images and videos. It has 32 GB of internal storage that is not expandable.

title: LG G Stylo Parts
legacyDescription:
The LG G Stylo was released in May 2015 succeeding the LG G3 Stylus. Although the phones seem to be very similar there are some key differences between the two devices.

- The resolution of the display increased to 720 x 1280 pixels from 540 x 960.
- Although the primary camera went from a 13 MP to an 8, they improved the camera by increasing the quality of pictures. With the f/2.4, increasing secondary camera to 5 MP from 1.3, and also added face detection and HDR, this phone has the superior camera.
- The LG G Stylo also has faster networking increasing from only 3G to 3G or 4G.

The OnePlus 2 released in 2015 features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 810 octa-core processor, 13 MP camera, and a 3,300 mAh battery. Unlike the OnePlus 1, which shipped with CyanogenMod OS, the 2 runs OnePlus's own OxygenOS version of Android.

On the outside, the OnePlus 2 offers a USB type-C port for charging and data transfer—it's one of the first mass-market phones to have one, although the transfer speed is USB 2.0 speed. The device has a single color option: Sandstone Black, although OnePlus offers a number of swappable rear cases to complement its aluminum-magnesium alloy frame.

Announced on October 9, 2018, and released on October 18, 2018, the Google Pixel 3 XL is Google's third generation, now with wireless charging and a notched display. It can be identified by its model number G013C.

The larger of Google's flagship smartphones, the Pixel 3 XL features a 6.3-inch OLED display with 523 ppi. Its brightly colored power button, rear-mounted fingerprint sensor, and glass backing with a partial matte finish are all key identifiers.

tagline: Grab a Fix Kit and bring your first generation Moto X smartphone back to life!
metaDescription: First Generation Moto X smartphone parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and adhesive all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The Moto X is Motorola's first phone since Google purchased the company and was released August 23, 2013. It features a 4.7” screen with a 1280 x 720 resolution, a 10 megapixel camera, and runs Android 5.1 (Lollipop).

Most Moto X repairs are made to replace cracked screens and swap out dead batteries. iFixit has complete repair kits for [Moto X screen replacements](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Android/Moto-X-Screen/IF391-001) and [Moto X battery replacements](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Android/Moto-X-Battery/IF391-000).

The Moto X’s rear cover is adhered to the frame, so once the phone is opened, its [adhesive](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Android/Moto-X-Rear-Cover-Adhesive/IF391-012) will need to be replaced. Our Moto X repair kits include the needed adhesive.

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's [Moto X repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/Motorola_Moto_X_1st_Generation) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

iFixit is an authorized Motorola parts reseller.

The Moto X pure screen is adhered to the frame, and the battery is adhered to the inside of the phone. Once the device is opened, this [adhesive](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Android/Moto-X-Pure-Rear-Cover-Adhesive/IF391-013) will need to be replaced. title: Moto Z2 Play (XT1710) Parts
description: iFixit has you covered with parts, tools, and free repair guides. Repair with confidence! All of our replacement parts are tested to rigorous standards and backed by our industry-leading warranty.
tagline: We’ve got all the parts and tools to get your Moto Z2 Play working again.
metaDescription: Moto Z2 Play parts for DIY repair. Screens, batteries, and adhesive all tested and guaranteed with fast shipping and easy returns.
legacyDescription:
The Motorola Moto Z2 Play is the second edition of the Moto Z Play line and was released in June of 2017. It is available from major U.S. carriers. The Moto Z2 Play looks very similar to the previous Moto Z Play version, so to identify the device as the Moto Z2 Play, look for the following physical characteristics:

- The back of the device is just metal and has no glass
- The design on the home screen is displayed in a colorful circle when turned on
- The flash in the upper left corner is an oval, not a circle

One of the Motorola Moto Z2 Play’s signature features is its magnetic back. This feature allows the device to be connected to any Moto Mod. Moto Mods can turn the Moto Z2 Play into a 360 degree camera, projector, video game controller, and much more. The strong magnetic connection on the back of the device ensures the Moto Mod stays on. Each Moto Mod has a one time setup on the device and will be automatically recognized after that.

legacyDescription:
The Motorola Moto E was designed and manufactured by the Motorola company and produced May of 2014. The Motorola Moto E boasts its powerful 5MP camera as well as its large 256 ppi display. The Moto E has a snapdragon 1.2 GHZ processor and 1 GB of ram. The internal storage is set at 4 GB. It is relatively light weight and was created for all carriers. It sports Gorilla Glass on its front panel. Although the Moto E is marketed as durable and resistant, it can still be damaged.

Most Moto E repairs are made to swap out dead batteries. iFixit has high quality [Moto E battery replacements](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Android/Moto-E-Battery/IF397-000).

Once you've bought your parts and tools, check out iFixit's [Moto E repair guides](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Device/Motorola_Moto_E_1st_Generation) for step-by-step instructions on how to make the fix.

iFixit is an authorized Motorola parts reseller.

This device operates on Amazon's Fire OS 4.0 and has a 1.5 GHz quad-core processor with 8 or 16 GB of memory.

Use our awesome [replacement guide](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Guide/Amazon+Fire+HD+7+(4th+Generation)+Battery+Replacement/71771) to replace a dead [battery](https://pnoble.cominor.com/Store/Amazon-Kindle/Kindle-Fire-HD-7-Inch-2014-4th-Gen-Battery/IF239-103) in your Amazon Fire HD 7 (4th Generation).
